Html:
I am using gmap in a winform application and now want to move this application to surface pro 3 tablet with windows 8. This tablet has resolution of 2160x1440, so I should make the gmap size to 2160x1440 before moving to the tablet right? And will increasing the size of the map have any effect on it's performance?


Thanks
set map docking to full, the more tiles you render the slower it is, try experiment with map.ForceDoubleBuffer = true;

How to set the docking to full? I only see fill. And I tried map.ForceDoubleBuffer=true but that shows a black screen on the map, I am putting it in the form.load.

Thanks
